mapper.select: select * from items order by item_num
select * from items where item_name like CONCAT('%',#{item_name},'%') order by item_num
select i.item_num, i.item_name, i.item_company, i.item_price, i.item_imgurl, c.cart_cnt, c.user_num from carts c, items i where user_num=#{user_num} and c.item_num = i.item_num
select * from users where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
select * from sellers where seller_id=#{seller_id} and seller_pwd=#{seller_pwd}
select * from kcal_cal where gender='man' and age=#{user_age}
select * from kcal_cal where gender='woman' and age=#{user_age}
mapper.insert: insert into items(item_name, item_company, item_price, item_serve, item_time, item_gram, item_imgurl, seller_num) values(#{item_name}, #{item_company}, #{item_price}, #{item_serve}, #{item_time}, #{item_gram}, #{item_imgurl}, #{seller_num})

insert into ingredients(item_kcal, item_nate, item_carbo, item_sugar, item_fat, item_trans, item_sat, item_col, item_protein) values(#{item_kcal}, #{item_nate}, #{item_carbo}, #{item_sugar}, #{item_fat}, #{item_trans}, #{item_sat}, #{item_col}, #{item_protein})
mapper.select: select items.*, ingredients.* from items, ingredients where items.item_num = ingredients.item_num order by item_protein desc
select items.*, ingredients.* from items, ingredients where items.item_num = ingredients.item_num order by item_kcal desc
select items.*, ingredients.* from items, ingredients where items.item_num = ingredients.item_num order by item_nate desc
select items.*, ingredients.* from items, ingredients where items.item_num = ingredients.item_num order by item_price desc
